# action

**Instance Property**

The selector defining the action message to send to the target object when the user taps this bar button item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var action: Selector? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is `nil`, no action message is sent. The default value is `nil`.

## Managing the action

- **primaryAction**: The action associated with the item.
- **changesSelectionAsPrimaryAction**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button represents an action or selection.
- **target**: The object that receives an action when the user selects the item.
